meanings.def: having a greater than average height
examples: the tallest building in the world
a tall glass of iced tea
He's grown taller since I last saw him.

meanings.def: used to describe or ask about the height of somebody/something
examples: He's six feet tall and weighs 200 pounds.
The fence is over five metres high.
He has climbed some of the world’s highest mountains.
How high was the plane when the engine failed?
My brother’s much taller than me.
She ordered cold beer in a tall glass.
Tall pine trees line the roadways.

meanings.def: to be very difficult to do
something large and successful often begins in a very small way
to show that you are proud and able to deal with anything
examples: Suddenly he seemed to stand taller.

idioms.def: to be very difficult to do
